It is reported<S>191</S> commonly<S>3654</S> that there is fornication<S>4202</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> such<S>5108</S> fornication<S>4202</S> as<S>3748</S> is<S>3687</S> not so much<S>3761</S> as named<S>3687</S> among<S>1722</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, that<S>5620</S> one<S>5100</S> should have<S>2192</S> his father's<S>3962</S> wife<S>1135</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> puffed up<S>5448</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>3996</S> not<S>3780</S> rather<S>3123</S> mourned<S>3996</S>, that<S>2443</S> he that hath done<S>4160</S> this<S>5124</S> deed<S>2041</S> might be taken away<S>1808</S> from<S>1537</S> among<S>3319</S> you<S>5216</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> verily<S>3303</S>, as<S>5613</S> absent<S>548</S> in body<S>4983</S>, but<S>1161</S> present<S>3918</S> in spirit<S>4151</S>, have judged<S>2919</S> already<S>2235</S>, as<S>5613</S> though I were present<S>3918</S>, concerning him that hath<S>2716</S> so<S>3779</S> done<S>2716</S> this deed<S>5124</S>, <sup>judged: or, determined</sup>
In<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, when ye<S>5216</S> are gathered together<S>4863</S>, and<S>2532</S> my<S>1699</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, with<S>4862</S> the power<S>1411</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>,
To deliver<S>3860</S> such an one<S>5108</S> unto Satan<S>4567</S> for<S>1519</S> the destruction<S>3639</S> of the flesh<S>4561</S>, that<S>2443</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> may be saved<S>4982</S> in<S>1722</S> the day<S>2250</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
Your<S>5216</S> glorying<S>2745</S> is not<S>3756</S> good<S>2570</S>. Know ye<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> a little<S>3398</S> leaven<S>2219</S> leaveneth<S>2220</S> the whole<S>3650</S> lump<S>5445</S>?
Purge out<S>1571</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the old<S>3820</S> leaven<S>2219</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye may be<S>5600</S> a new<S>3501</S> lump<S>5445</S>, as<S>2531</S> ye are<S>2075</S> unleavened<S>106</S>. For<S>1063</S> even<S>2532</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> passover<S>3957</S> is sacrificed<S>2380</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S>: <sup>is sacrificed: or, is slain</sup>
Therefore<S>5620</S> let us keep the feast<S>1858</S>, not<S>3361</S> with<S>1722</S> old<S>3820</S> leaven<S>2219</S>, neither<S>3366</S> with<S>1722</S> the leaven<S>2219</S> of malice<S>2549</S> and<S>2532</S> wickedness<S>4189</S>; but<S>235</S> with<S>1722</S> the unleavened<S>106</S> bread of sincerity<S>1505</S> and<S>2532</S> truth<S>225</S>. <sup>the feast: or, holyday</sup>
I wrote<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> in<S>1722</S> an epistle<S>1992</S> not<S>3361</S> to company<S>4874</S> with fornicators<S>4205</S>:
Yet<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> altogether<S>3843</S> with the fornicators<S>4205</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>, or<S>2228</S> with the covetous<S>4123</S>, or<S>2228</S> extortioners<S>727</S>, or<S>2228</S> with idolaters<S>1496</S>; for<S>1893</S> then<S>686</S> must ye needs<S>3784</S> go<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the world<S>2889</S>.
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> I have written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> not<S>3361</S> to keep company<S>4874</S>, if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> that is called<S>3687</S> a brother<S>80</S> be<S>2228</S> a fornicator<S>4205</S>, or<S>2228</S> covetous<S>4123</S>, or<S>2228</S> an idolater<S>1496</S>, or<S>2228</S> a railer<S>3060</S>, or<S>2228</S> a drunkard<S>3183</S>, or<S>2228</S> an extortioner<S>727</S>; with such an one<S>5108</S> no not<S>3366</S> to eat<S>4906</S>.
For<S>1063</S> what<S>5101</S> have I<S>3427</S> to do to judge<S>2919</S> them also<S>2532</S> that are without<S>1854</S>? do<S>2919</S> not<S>3780</S> ye<S>5210</S> judge<S>2919</S> them that are within<S>2080</S>?
But<S>1161</S> them that are without<S>1854</S> God<S>2316</S> judgeth<S>2919</S>. Therefore<S>2532</S> put away<S>1808</S> from<S>1537</S> among yourselves<S>5216</S> that<S>846</S> wicked person<S>4190</S>.
